trends: There has been one other sighting in Rutherfordton
There were no other sightings in Rutherfordton on or around March 1st 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was walkin my dog in my yard on that afternoon at around 2 pm when i noticed a bright wing shaped object that looked to be about 30 to 35 thousand feet up exacuting very tight banked turns as i watched it closley because iv never seen anything but a bird do such tight turns and thought it strange because it was either reflicting the sunlight or glowing, i watched for 4or so minutes untill it headed off in a north to north west heading and dissapeard almost imedeatly .
Summary: i watched the glowing wing shaped object doing very tight 360 degree turns for several minutes untill it proceeded off in a north westerley stright path and dissapeared shortley there after
